subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Brad Marchand’s goal at 15 minutes 40 seconds of overtime ended the first Rangers-Bruins playoff game in 40 years, as Boston prevailed in the opener of the second-round series.
snippet: Brad Marchand’s goal at 15 minutes 40 seconds of overtime ended the first Rangers-Bruins playoff game in 40 years, as Boston prevailed in the opener of the second-round series.
